programme.desc: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is hell-bent on drinking himself into oblivion.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: At home, Jun-hee thinks back to how her mother interfered in her life.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Yi-jung is waiting outside for Eun-jae, happy to see her until he overhears her phone conversation.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo pleads for Jan Di to tell him not to get married.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo tells Jan Di that he'll protect her but she says that she doesn't want to be protected.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Perhaps feeling it’s time to reveal one truth, Mr. Jung leads Jun-hee to the mystery patient’s bedside.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Syn Grzechotnika
programme.desc: Niesłusznie posądzony za grabież wojskowego skarbca, Tony Garrett ucieka i szuka prawdziwych winowajców, żeby się zemścić.

programme.title: Wojownik z równin
programme.desc: Jim Dancer, były bandyta, staje się szeryfem w Kansas, próbując zacząć nowe życie. Po tragicznych wydarzeniach z przeszłości, przyjmuje tożsamość detektywa Cummingsa. Jako szeryf walczy z przestępczością i korupcją w miasteczku, jednocześnie stawiając czoła zemście Berta Slocuma, brata zabitego przez niego mężczyzny.

programme.title: Trumna Dla Szeryfa
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen wciela się w rolę Shenandoah, człowieka zagadki, który dołącza do złowrogiej bandy rozbójników po przejściu niemal niemożliwej do wykonania i wymagającej śmierci inicjacji.

programme.title: Dzikie Rewolwery
programme.desc: Okrutny i bezwzględny bandyta zabija właściciela tawerny, który wydał go władzom.

programme.title: Dni Nienawiści
programme.desc: Benson poluje na gang bandytów, którzy zabili jego rodziców, brata i siostry poza jedną - Susy, którą zwyrodnialcy chcą mieć dla siebie!

programme.title: Znajdź Miejsce W Którym Możesz Umrzeć
programme.desc: Wyrzutek, żołnierz Konfederacji, odkupuje swoje winy broniąc kobiety przed bandytami, którzy są gotowi ją zabić dla kopalni złota.

programme.title: Keoma
programme.desc: Półkrwi były rewolwerowiec z Unii próbuje uchronić swoje ogarnięte zarazą rodzinne miasto przed przejęciem władzy przez rasistowskich przyrodnich braci i konfederackiego tyrana.

programme.title: Najgorszy Rewolwerowiec Dzikiego Zachodu
programme.desc: Ułaskawiona złodziejka zostaje rządową agentką. Aby móc wyruszyć z karawaną na zachód, mieć męża. Wychodzi więc za mąż za naiwnego i niczego niepodejrzewającego dentystę ze wschodniego wybrzeża.

programme.title: Kalifornijski szlak
programme.desc: Właściciel saloonu zostaje wrobiony przez wspólnika w napad na dyliżans. By oczyścić swoje imię, wyrusza w desperacką podróż pełną niebezpieczeństw. W tym samym czasie los łączy go z kobietą, która także walczy o przetrwanie. Razem stawiają czoła przeciwnościom na Kalifornijskim szlaku.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Zemsta Ringo
programme.desc: Dwóch poszukiwaczy przygód ratuje życie mężczyzny, który ma na plecach wytatuowaną mapę skarbów. Druga potrzebna mapa znajduje się na plecach szeryfa. Zaczyna się polowanie.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Noc Węża
programme.desc: Hernández, dowódca garnizonu w małej wiosce, dołącza do grupy mieszczan, którzy chcą ograbić młodego chłopca - Manuela - ze spadku.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Samuraj
programme.desc: Koniec XIX wieku. Cesarz Japonii wysyła w prezencie prezydentowi USA świętego kucyka. Ten jednak zostaje skradziony przez Indian, którzy żądają miliona dolarów okupu. Szeryf Blackjack Gideon oferuje dostarczenie okupu i odebranie kucyka.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Dwa Krzyże w Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy i Alex to rodzeństwo, które ocalało z masakry zleconej przez bezwzględnego Morana.

programme.title: Strzelaj Joe, Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Bandyci poszukują człowieka o imieniu Joe, który posiada mapę do skradzionych pieniędzy zabranych przez ich szefa podczas napadu na bank.

programme.title: Django... Adiós!
programme.desc: Django jest szeryfem, który zostaje niesłusznie aresztowany za kradzież skrzyni pełnej dolarów, przeznaczonych na budowę szkoły i kościoła w Silver City.

programme.title: Wszyscy Bracia z Zachodu Wspierają Swojego Ojca
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Kto pragnie zemsty?
programme.desc: Dwóch rewolwerowców wjeżdża do miasta z planem odebrania dużej, acz niezasłużonej nagrody. Zostają wplątani w lokalną wojnę o ziemię związaną ze zbliżającą się budową kolei.

programme.title: Requiem dla Gringo
programme.desc: Wyjątkowy eurowestern, którego bohaterem jest astrolog noszący garnitur w panterkę.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Dorwać Chaco
programme.desc: Chaco to Meksykanin, który zdaje się uciekać przed każdym. Zostaje oskarżony o morderstwo paru bydlaków.

programme.title: Ręce Do Góry Truposzu! Jesteś Aresztowany
programme.desc: Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), ocalały z rzezi urządzonej przez wojska północy, szuka zemsty. Działa w pojedynkę i uderza w każdą osobę zamieszaną w masakrę.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Podróżnik z Missouri
programme.desc: Zbiegły sierota, Biarn Turner (De Wilde), próbuje uciec od kłopotów, podróżując na Florydę na początku XX wieku. Trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie redaktor lokalnej gazety, Doyle Magee (Merrill), postanawia przygarnąć chłopca i dać mu szansę na normalne życie. Zamożny miejscowy farmer, Tobias Brown (Marvin), również interesuje się przyszłością Biarna, ale traktuje młodego człowieka surowo, maskując prawdziwe ukryte uczucia Tobiasa i szczerą troskę. Maniery Biarna i jego chęć niesienia pomocy innym szybko zjednują mu przychylność mieszkańców miasteczka, a on sam udowadnia swoją wartość, przygotowując pozornie niezdolnego do treningu konia do wyścigu, który miasto zorganizuje podczas...

programme.title: Czerwień Cassidy
programme.desc: Kobieta powraca do rodzinnego miasta, w poszukiwaniu zemsty za zabójstwo kochanka, który zginął z rąk jej byłego narzeczonego. Rozdarta między miłością, nienawiścią, lojalnością i pragnieniem zemsty, kobieta traci panowanie nad swoim planem.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec od Stu Krzyży
programme.desc: Na Dzikim Zachodzie ginie pewien Irlandczyk. Jego syn Jimmy wyrusza na poszukiwanie zabójców ojca, ale wpada w zasadzkę i również zostaje zabity.

programme.title: Człowiek z Utah
programme.desc: Szeryf wysyła Johna Westona na rodeo, aby dowiedział się, kto zabija tam jeźdźcówmających wygrać nagrodę pieniężną. Barton zorganizował rodeo i planuje wyjechać z całą nagrodą pieniężną ufundowaną przez mieszkańców miasteczka. Kiedy wydaje się, że Weston pokona jeźdźca Bartona, jego ludzie przygotowują dla niego taki sam los, jaki spotkał innych jeźdźców.

programme.title: Anioł i złoczyńca
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, wszechstronny złoczyńca, wraca do zdrowia. Opiekuje się nim Penelope Worth, kwakierka. Quirt musi wybrać między swoim światem a światem, w którym żyje Penelope.

programme.title: Wojny drapieżców
programme.desc: Kowboj Dan Somers i potentat naftowy Jim „Hunk” Gardner rywalizują o prawa do dzierżawy działek naftowych na ziemiach Indian w Oklahomie. Walczą także o względy nauczycielki Cathy Allen.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Zwali go Cemetery
programme.desc: John i George McIntire to dwaj naiwni braci, którzy wyjeżdżają do ogarniętego bezprawiem miasteczka na dalekim zachodzie, aby zobaczyć się z ojcem.

programme.title: Sześciu Łowców Głów do Masakry
programme.desc: Gubernator Kansas wynajmuje sześciu rewolwerowców, aby obalić despotyczne rządy samozwańczego bossa Abilene, który przetrzymuje kilku zakładników, w tym rodzinę gubernatora.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros
programme.desc: Samotny rewolwerowiec tropi członków bandy, która zabiła jego przyjaciół.

programme.title: Zabójca w Czerni
programme.desc: W Tombstone nowy szeryf przysięga oczyścić miasto z bandytów, takich jak bracia O'Hara, a pomaga mu w tym dziwaczny prawnik, który zawsze nosi przy sobie dwie duże księgi prawnicze.

programme.title: Za Zemstę Oddam Życie
programme.desc: Meksykański gang, na którego czele stoi nikczemny Pedro, terroryzuje tereny między Nowym Meksykiem a Arizoną.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Złamany
programme.desc: Zhańbiona gwiazda sportu uzależniona także od hazardu próbuje zmienić swoje życie dzięki wsparciu swojego fana numer jeden.

programme.title: Buntownik z Mafii
programme.desc: Przez śmiertelną pomyłkę mafijny najemnik rozpoczyna brutalną krucjatę przeciwko swojemu szefowi, jednocześnie mierząc się ze swoją przeszłością.

programme.title: Streamer
programme.desc: Odizolowany młody mężczyzna popada w obsesję na punkcie dziewczyny z kamerki internetowej, która mieszka w jego budynku. Zaprzyjaźnia się z nią, pomimo sprzecznych uczuć.

programme.title: Wszystko o Ewie
programme.desc: Wszystko o Eve. Eva, rezolutna i powabna młoda dżokejka, przenika do stajni Pope'a Healy'ego, bogatego magnata wyścigowego.

programme.title: Wesele dla swingersów
programme.desc: Film komediowy w wersji z polskim lektorem - Wesele dla swingersów. Producent telewizyjny zaprasza swoich dawnych przyjaciół z college'u na wesele.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Boże Dopomóż!
programme.desc: W tej komedii o seksualnych skandalach w kościele Rain pojawiają się przerysowane osobowości i chaos.

programme.title: Wszystko w Swoim Czasie
programme.desc: Charlie rzuca pracę i przenosi się do domu, by kierować zespołem rockowym z rodzinnego miasta. Jego wspierająca dziewczyna podziela jego miłość do zespołu, aż do momentu, gdy walka w zespole zmusza ich do dokonania wyborów, które na zawsze wpłyną na ich życie.

programme.title: Pocałunek Lady X
programme.desc: Zhańbiony były tajny agent ryzykuje swoje życie, a także życie swojej ragtagowej drużyny, gdy szuka zemsty na charyzmatycznym terroryście, który zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Walka
programme.desc: Młody weteran piechoty morskiej wraca z wojny i staje przed nowym wyzwaniem. Musi zmierzyć się z biedą, bólem fizycznym i psychicznymi ranami, które wyniósł z frontu. Codzienność okazuje się trudniejsza niż pole bitwy.

programme.title: Jurassic Shark
programme.desc: Firma naftowa nieświadomie uwalnia z lodowego więzienia prehistorycznego rekina, a ten osacza na opuszczonej wyspie grupę złodziei i piękne młode studentki college'u.

programme.title: Krwawa Gra
programme.desc: Profesjonalny zawodnik sztuk walki Ryan McGowan (Vince Segovia) rozpoczyna współpracę z policją, by walczyć z rosnącą w mieście przestępczością i coraz to brutalniejszymi bandytami.

programme.title: Zabójstwo Niewinności
programme.desc: Nowy pastor dowiaduje się, jak ważne jest zapewnienie stabilności, uzdrowienia i nadziei po tym, jak podwójne zabójstwo wstrząsa jego społecznością.

programme.title: Gdybym Ci Powiedział, Musiałbym Cię Zabić
programme.desc: Profesor religioznawstwa jest zmuszony zbadać, kto i dlaczego morduje jego studentów. Gdy odkryje prawdę umrze, a następnie odrodzi się na nowo.

programme.title: Czas Końca
programme.desc: Trzy kobiety walczą o przetrwanie w alaskańskiej dziczy po tym, jak tajemnicze wydarzenie sprawiło, że zostały bez dachu nad głową. Na swojej drodze spotykają innych ocalałych, którzy albo chcą im pomóc, albo wprost przeciwnie. Natrafiają także na nadnaturalne coś...

programme.title: Miliony
programme.desc: Historia sześciu dwudziestoparoletnich Azjatów: Brandona (Marzyciel), Derona (Czarna Owca), Mary (Tomboy), Charliego (Cynik), Jaya (Playboy) i Eddiego (Mózg).

programme.title: 6 Niepalących
programme.desc: Dr Henry Caldwell, najlepszy mediator na świecie, staje przed największym wyzwaniem w swojej karierze, kiedy przyjmuje sześciu współlokatorów, których jedyną wspólną cechą jest to, że żaden z nich nie pali.

programme.title: Dom babci
programme.desc: Dom babci - Nastolatka i jej przyrodni bracia zostają zmuszeni do zamieszkania z babcią. Przekonują się, co znaczy prawdziwa miłość, wiara i rodzina. Wszystko to dzięki surowym zasadom narzucanym przez babcię i jej oddaniu. Jak każda rodzina tak i ta przeżywa swoje wzloty i upadki.

programme.title: Bandyci z Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Rozwydrzony pięciolatek Byron Reed (Chris Williams) w noc poprzedzającą rodzinną wycieczkę jest niegrzeczny, więc jego matka (Natasha Alam) każe mu usiąść na karnym krzesełku. Kiedy Byron budzi się w pustym domu, zakłada, że spełniło się jego życzenie, by nie mieć rodziny.

programme.title: Pod Słońce
programme.desc: Aspirujący młody pisarz (Jackson) śledzi tytana literatury (Keitel) cierpiącego na blokadę pisarską do jego schronienia na wsi we Włoszech i uczy się o życiu i miłości od niepokornego geniusza i jego córek.

programme.title: Perfekcyjny Break
programme.desc: Tytuł mistrza świata to dla Bobby'ego Stevensa najwyższa nagroda. Miał szansę dotrzeć do wielkiego finału, ale z jakiegoś powodu zamarł w walce z Rayem Carterem. Mecz skończył się prawie do zera, a Bobby nie mógł wbić do łuzy żadnej bili.

programme.title: Rodzinne Strony
programme.desc: Film przedstawia tydzień z życia pozornie przeciętnej rodziny. Harvey za wszelką cenę stara się utrzymać swój nowy biznes na powierzchni w niepewnej sytuacji gospodarczej. Crystal jest pełnoetatową mamą, która trzyma Pearl, ich 10-letnią córkę, w ryzach i zarządza obowiązkami domowymi. Kiedy Josh, kłopotliwy brat Crystal, pojawia się nie mając dokąd pójść, równowaga ich rutyny zostaje zachwiana. Ten niespodziewany dodatek do rodziny rozpoczyna serię wydarzeń, które obnażają ukryte problemy, niedoskonałości i podejrzenia, które zagrażają podstawom ich rodzinnych więzi.

programme.title: Zniszczenie
programme.desc: W środku nocy Donovan jedzie ze swoją dziewczyną Lucy i kilkoma przyjaciółmi na sekretne spotkanie w lesie.

programme.title: Wszystkie Nasze Choroby
programme.desc: Dramat skład się z czterech połączonych ze sobą historii obracających się wokół miłości, narkotyków i biedy w Filadelfii.

programme.title: Porzucony syn
programme.desc: Kylie Morgan jest prywatnym detektywem polującym na bezdusznego zabójcę. Nie ma nic poza czystą wolą. Prędko znajduje pomoc w detektywie Anthonym Woodsie.

programme.title: Stwór w Lesie
programme.desc: Trzech byłych studentów filmowych University of Delaware jedzie do Hobgood w Karolinie Północnej, aby nakręcić dokument o przetrwaniu w nadmorskich lasach.

programme.title: Zwyczajna Rodzina
programme.desc: Cztero osobową rodzinę dopada ich ukryte życie, izolacja od siebie nawzajem i przeszłość. Kulminacją jest jedyna rzecz, której unikali... konfrontacja. Rodzina rozpada się, gdy żona i matka ukrywa swój alkoholizm, a mąż próbuje ukryć swoje pożądanie do innej kobiety. Córka eksperymentuje z seksem, narkotykami i alkoholem, a syn tworzy sobie wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który jest jego opiekunem.

programme.title: Młodzi Poszukiwacze
programme.desc: Akcja filmu rozgrywa się w roku 1893 roku na amerykańskim zachodzie. Marcus O'Rileya (Riley) i jego wspólnik The Magician (Magik) są wolnymi strzelcami wyspecjalizowanymi w odzyskiwaniu ludowych przedmiotów.

programme.title: Metoda Menkoffa
programme.desc: W tej satyrycznej komedii introwertyczny pracownik banku, David Cork, łączy siły z człowiekiem od zadań specjalnych Ruby Jacksonem, by pokonać złego guru HRu - Maxa Menkoffa.

programme.title: Gotowi, Chętni i Zdolni
programme.desc: Samantha Martin zostaje ranna podczas jednej z misji i jest zmuszona do przejścia na emeryturę z CIA. Odkrywa, że kret w CIA współpracuje z terrorystami w celu zdobycia broni chemicznej, która ma zostać zniszczona przez rząd USA. Nie mogąc skontaktować się z CIA, tworzy zgraną grupę kolegów z CIA, aby powstrzymać terrorystów i zdemaskować nieuczciwego agenta CIA.

programme.title: Pomocy! Mój Detektyw Jest Idiotą!
programme.desc: Beznadziejny detektyw z Nowego Orleanu Biff Basham zostaje wplątany w sprawę szantażu, szpiegostwa i morderstw.

programme.title: Zakochana Shirin
programme.desc: Miłość nie zna granic i takie jest założenie uroczej, irańsko-amerykańskiej komedii romantycznej "Zakochana Shirin".

programme.title: Goliat i grzechy Babilonu
programme.desc: Goliat staje do walki o wolność Babilończyków, mierząc się z tyranią i zdradą. Bogata scenografia, widowiskowe sceny akcji i charyzmatyczny Mark Forest nadają filmowi wyjątkowy klimat. Zręczna reżyseria i humor w stylu dawnych epopei dodają uroku tej klasycznej produkcji peplum.

programme.title: Opowieści z Zachodniej Wirginii
programme.desc: Trzy historie ukazujące co to znaczy żyć, znajdować więź, radzić sobie z traumą i robić coś więcej niż tylko istnieć, w wiejskim krajobrazie małego górniczego miasteczka w Zachodniej Wirginii.

programme.title: Z Galopem
programme.desc: Po zrażeniu się od czasu śmierci matki w atakach jedenastego września, zarówno córka, jak i ojciec muszą pracować razem, aby przywrócić ich relacje.

programme.title: Kongresmen
programme.desc: Zdeterminowany kongresmen, niezrażony polityczną zdradą, zaciekłym atakiem mediów i niedawnym rozwodem, stara się zachować godność i chronić małą wioskę rybacką przed korupcją.

programme.title: Z Premedytacją
programme.desc: Czterech niezależnych filmowców zapuszcza się do małego wiejskiego miasteczka na festiwal filmowy i obiecujące spotkanie z dyrektorem filmowym. Zostają wtrąceni do więzienia za ohydną zbrodnię, a nikt nie pamięta wydarzeń z poprzedniej nocy.

programme.title: Pułapka na ośmiornice
programme.desc: Mężczyzna przeżywający załamanie nerwowe odnajduje jedyną rzecz, bez której nie może żyć i zaraz potem ją traci. Nie może przywrócić kobiety, którą kocha, ale może pokryć ziemię krwią swojego wroga.

programme.title: Wielka Stopa
programme.desc: Pewna rodzina wprowadza się do domku na odludziu tylko po to, by dać się sterroryzować dziwnemu, przerażającemu stworzeniu z lasu.

programme.title: Pracodawca
programme.desc: Pięciu wysoko wykwalifikowanych kandydatów odbywa rozmowę kwalifikacyjną o pożądaną pracę. W noc poprzedzającą ostatnią rundę rozmów kwalifikacyjnych, wszyscy zostają porwani i odurzeni narkotykami. Następnego dnia budzą się uwięzieni razem w zamkniętym pokoju bez nadziei na ucieczkę.

programme.title: Colorado Kid
programme.desc: Cowboy star Bob Steele (Valley of Hunted Men, The Trail Blazers) headlines this Poverty Row western drama. As the Colorado Kid, he's falsely arrested for murder and has to clear himself. The colorful cast includes Ernie Adams, Frank LaRue, and Horace Murphy, with direction by Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town, The Mad Monster).

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney take time out from their duties to try and collect the bounty posted on a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills. A couple of wolf hunters don't take kindly to a pair of amateur hunters horning in on their range and attempt to drive the G-Men away before they can capture or kill their quarry.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney travel to Wyoming to oversee a land opening and end up playing nursemaid to a pair of identical twin pranksters and a kooky Chinese cook. Meanwhile, a trio of outlaws are pursuing the twins seeking information they possess. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In Family Ties, Judge Bean comes to the aid of the Peralta family as unscrupulous real estate agents try to force them off their land. They've learned that a railroad will need the property and they intend to make an undeserved profit. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, crooks posing as newspapermen attempt to blackmail a local rancher in order to steal his land and property. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise between the settlers and the Ottawas. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunter's search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: IT'S A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin' Singin' Fightin' Buckaroos Stop 'Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger get top billing in this one, while the senorita of the title, Dale Evans, is billed fourth. Maybe Dale needed a better agent! Then again, who pays attention to screen credits when you have such a funfilled fiesta of thrills and action? Roys most zestful musical adventure is about a worthless gold mine that turns out to have a hidden shaft filled with riches. But can Roy make the claim while hes trying to outrun a trumped up robbery charge? Its romance, rhythm, and revelry, all from Republic Pictures. Musical numbers include Bunk House Bugle Boy and Besame Mucho, plus the beautiful title song performed by Roy!

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe's date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. There's plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, you'll be glad to know there's no singing in this one. It's just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny O'Neil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects O'Neill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barrett's gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.
